p: The results of our phytochemical analysis showed consistent differences in the content of Palestinian T. bovei when compared with the only study which was conducted on the similar species by Tepe et al. 2011. Trans-geraniol, α-citral and β-citral were identified as major components of the Palestinian T. bovei essential oil while the major components of the Turkish T. bovei essential oil were carvacrol, p-cymene and thymol. This may be due to the differences between the two geographic and topographic areas, which may greatly affect their constituents [19, 20].
